fields.productCanLinkedWithNonLeafCategories: Allow to link Products to non-leaf categories.
fields.behaviorOnCatalogChange: Behavior on catalog unlink/change for a product
fields.behaviorOnCategoryTreeUnlinkFromCatalog: Behavior on category tree unlink from catalog

labels.removeOnlyInheritedAttributesWithNoValue: Remove only inherited attributes with no value

messages.productCanLinkedWithNonLeafCategoriesCha: Are you sure you want to disable linking products to non-leaf categories? All products linked to them will be automatically unlinked.

exceptions.languageUsedInChannel: Language, used in some channel, cannot be removed.

tooltips.productCanLinkedWithNonLeafCategories: If set you will be able to link products with categories, which have child categories.
tooltips.behaviorOnCatalogChange: In case of "Cascade" all the categories linked with the product will be automatically unlinked.
tooltips.behaviorOnCategoryDelete: In case of "Cascade" all subcategories of this category will be also removed and all products linked to this category or its subcategories will be unlinked.
tooltips.behaviorOnCategoryTreeUnlinkFromCatalog: In case of "Cascade" all the categories of this tree linked with the products will be automatically unlinked.
